GoPro x Eyes of a Nomad

Collaboration Proposal

Oh hey GoPro.
Let's go to Japan together and make some magic.

Let me introduce myself.


@eyesofanomad


Photograher | Videographer | Content Creator | Adventurer | Teacher

I'm Emilio, aka Eyes of a Nomad

I'm a content creator from Melbourne Australia currently living the dream in Bali, Indonesia. I love helping brands capture the essence of their personality and really telling a story through my work.

I split my time between travelling the world, doing photography & videography for brands, and teaching the next generation of content creators through my school the Institute of Code.

I'm also currently creating an online photography course that will teach students from all over the world how to take epic photos & edit them in lightroom and photoshop, which is launching early 2019.

My Audience

Every single day I have people asking my advice for the perfect photography workflow -- whether it's followers on instagram, students at Institute of Code, or fellow content creators on group trips. I'm always seeking and sharing the latest tools to make life as a photographer easier, and when I find brands that I love, I can't talk about them enough.

My audience is predominately aspiring photographers, influencers and content creators. It's a premium audience that like to invest in quality (our course is a $4.5k investment), believe in the value of community, and generally love travel and adventure.

I've worked with some pretty amazing brands

I've worked with local and international fashion & lifestyle brands, luxury villas and hotels, cafes and restaurants, tour companies and more. My work has been featured by BBC, NYtimes, CNN, Discovery and is re-shared by major instagram accounts like @artofvisuals and @moodygrams. Just a few brands that I've worked with include...

  • The Mulia Resort
  • Pared Sunglasses
  • La Lunia Liveaboad (Luxury Komodo Cruises)
  • Magali Pascal
  • Bricks Milano
  • Ark Swimwear
  • Mimpi Mattress
  • Uluwatu Surf Villas
  • Allie Ayers (Sports Illustrated Model)

Engagement Rate

From Karaoke bars in Tokyo to the slopes of Sapporro, I want to capture it all on GoPro.

Objective

I want to help you foster a community of content creators who recognise GoPro as an essential part of every photographers tool kit, and understand it's ruggedness, reliability, ease of use and ability to bring people together.

I'm blown away by the quality of the Hero 7 -- it represents a huge leap in technology for action cameras. And I'm excited to advocate for the brand.

My Pitch

In exchange for gifting 1x GoPro Hero 7 Black + a few accessories I would love to offer you...

  • 6x high resolution professionally edited photos shot on the GoPro
  • 6x high resolution professionally edited photos shot of the GoPro in use in epic locations
  • 1x 30 second video of our two week trip to Japan shot on GoPro
  • 1x unboxing video on @eyesofanomad instagram story, explaining why I love the GoPro7 and what the features are.
  • inclusion in a 'Gear Guide for Photographers' on www.instituteofcode.com blog
  • mention in 3 separate instagram stories over the next 3 months
  • 3x feature an instagram post on @eyesofanomad with detailed caption about the product
  • include in our recommended purchase list for students of my in-person and online courses for 6 months

Why I think we're the perfect fit.

After recently trying a friends GoPro Hero 7 Black I fell in love with the product and know that my audience will too.

I'm about to embark on a content creation trip through Japan, and would love to showcase that off-the-beaten path journey through the lens of a GoPro7. My audience is full of aspiring photographers looking to me for advice on the best gear, and I know that they'll be eager to see why I chose to shoot such an epic destination on GoPro compared to my Canon 5D MKIV or Lumix GH5.

Slide into my inbox
